summary: Provides a collection of helper utilities for managing graph datasets in DGL, including dataset subsetting, data download and verification, archive extraction, checksum validation, mask generation, and serialization of graphs and tensors, as well as deprecation support.
business_intent: Enable reliable and convenient handling of graph datasets by automating common tasks such as downloading, integrity checking, extracting, loading, saving, and creating views of datasets, thereby simplifying data preparation for graph learning workflows.
